name: Souls Must Rest
description:
Game made for the week long intersemester game jam. Thanks to the organizers! 

Storyline: A problem occurred in one of the cemeteries of the company death and company. You are one of the new reapers whose aim is to calm down the souls by burying them again.

The controls are touch based.

If you experience errors with the web version or want to enjoy the game otherwise, a windows version is available

Made by HugoM
